meanings.definition: Organisms that have a life cycle in which the haploid phase is the dominant phase.
meanings.sent1: Haplonts are organisms that mainly exist in their haploid form.
meanings.sent2: The life cycle of haplonts involves a dominant haploid phase.
meanings.sent3: The haplonts decided to throw a party for their haploid friends.
meanings.sent4: In the world of haplonts, being haploid is like being the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The haplonts danced joyfully in their haploid stage.

meanings.definition: A type of life cycle in which the organism spends most of its life as a haploid individual.
meanings.sent1: Most of the time, haplonts live as haploid individuals.
meanings.sent2: In haplonts, the majority of their life is spent as haploid beings.
meanings.sent3: The haplonts threw a haploid-themed party to celebrate their unique life cycle.
meanings.sent4: Living as haploid individuals, haplonts embrace their unique life journey.
meanings.sent5: The haplonts' world revolves around their haploid existence.
